Keywords: Avengers , Cosmic , Dark Avengers , Horsemen
Real Name: Robert Reynolds
Special Powers
TEN THOUSAND EXPLODING SUNS: Sentry can reduce penetrating damage.
HORSEMAN OF DEATH: When Sentry KO's an opposing character, after resolutions roll a d6: 1-2: Deal him 1 unavoidable damage. 3-6: Remove an action token from him.
SUBSONIC FLIGHT: Flurry. Charge, but do not halve speed.

i wish he started with Exploit, but otherwise he's really not bad... he keep healing on top of being able to reduce penetrating damage, which i don't understand why the later isn't given out to more higher point characters.
December 26, 2021
Disasstah
[QUOTE=Goop;12163510]A lot of people are probably going to dismiss him since he has that negative effect but honestly with all that steal energy and flurry at the top it wont matter much. Although he doesn't have any real interesting powers he is still a BEAST of a figure. Trait can remove tokens off him, cosmic energy willpower can remove tokens off him. He does pen damage and nullifies enemies pen damage. He's actually very good, just a little bland and slightly over costed is all..[/QUOTE] Nobody is dismissing him. He's a powerful piece that can do insane damage. It's one thing to troll the boards but you actively lower a figures rating. This is a hard hitting piece and I think he pairs amazingly with the new Beast. He can carry around an empower piece and get full benefit from it, all the while being insanely hard to hit and hurt. I'm certain this figure will see meta play since his stats are insane, the keywords are useful and he can use equipment.
December 14, 2021
jcintro
One of the most cost effective versions of The Sentry. A brick that can hit very hard and very fast. MULTIPLE ways to clear tokens off of himself. Ways for him to heal. In the right set up, he will be bringing the pain to whatever figure he deems the most potent threat. One of my top choices for chase pulls from this set.
November 7, 2021
dasaul29
I actually called that he would be in this set, well before he was revealed (thanks WizKids for always giving me my dark avengers piecemeal, smh). I was scared he would not have the keyword when I saw him. Now that we know his dial, I say prayers of thanks that he does. As mentioned in previous posts, he is a beast! I also appreciate that he has a reasonable point value as well. Surprisingly, I'm not so sure he is a true replacement for the CW sentry outside of the little aging on stats. I can see myself grabbing both and mixing it up. This is no doubt my biggest want from this set.

October 28, 2021
Buckwheat
FINALLY, a Sentry with range value! Defensively, he's a brick wall. Outwit, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, and Exploit Weakness don't affect him. And Pulse Wave...well...sucks. Him taking a couple damage isn't all bad, when you can then deal 8 penetrating damage, in one action, via Flurry/EW—and then, of course, heal back to full, via Steal Energy. If you can make a few successful rolls for Willpower and his Trait, then he'll be an absolute killing machine.
October 27, 2021
Goop
A lot of people are probably going to dismiss him since he has that negative effect but honestly with all that steal energy and flurry at the top it wont matter much. Although he doesn't have any real interesting powers he is still a BEAST of a figure. Trait can remove tokens off him, cosmic energy willpower can remove tokens off him. He does pen damage and nullifies enemies pen damage. He's actually very good, just a little bland and slightly over costed is all..
